A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: People want to either hate or love it\, but the truth is that the movie is on par\, average\, and acceptable. There is not a singular greatest criticism or a singular greatest praise: they tried a few new things\, while definitely rehearsing old story. It will be tempting to polarize your opinion\, but I think this is a good opportunity to accept a movie that just runs in the middle of expectations. It is by NO means worst than prequels\, but it is also not the best Star Wars movie.
